none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 26, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
Sometimes - not very often, but sometimes - a band self describes perfectly. Sometimes a band describe themselves in a manner that makes you know how you're going to feel when you listen, and then they make you feel like that....but more. This is one of those times.    It's worth also mentioning that this six song tape is terrifyingly good. The songs, the recording, the lyrics, the guitars (seriously, the leads are so sick...somehow balancing Reatard and Mould and COCTEAU TWINS at the same time), the entire presentation. Fit is one of the most perfect recordings that I heard in 2018.  FIT
https://estrangedcommunications.bandcamp.com/album/302

seo.title: Tangent -  - Terminal Escape
